AT&T Network Coverage in New York

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing New York residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the Empire State. With 99% population coverage, you'll stay connected wherever you go.

Why New York Residents Choose Vouch Mobile

  • No Credit Check: Perfect for new New York residents, students, or anyone rebuilding credit.
  • AT&T Network Quality: Get reliable coverage at a fraction of the price.
  • Simple Pricing: Just $30/month for unlimited everything. No hidden fees.
  • 5G Included: Access to AT&T's 5G network across major New York cities.
  • No Contracts: Month-to-month service. Cancel anytime.
  • Keep Your Number: Easily port your existing phone number.

How to Get Started in New York

  1. Check Your Phone: Make sure your phone is unlocked and compatible.
  2. Choose Your Plan: Select our $30/month unlimited plan.
  3. Order Your SIM: Free shipping to any New York address.
  4. Activate Online: Simple activation takes just minutes.
  5. Start Saving: Enjoy unlimited service across New York.
